alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 21 at 12:35PM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland and Eastern Highland Counties. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Pendleton and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Pendleton
